Title: Central African Republic approves Kigali
Summary: CENTRAL AFRICAN REPUBLIC: The latest country to officially approve the Kigali Amendment to phase down HFCs is the Central African Republic.

Title: Euro heat pump sales show slight increase
Summary: BELGIUM: The European heat pump market is showing a slight yet uneven recovery this year, according to new statistics from the European Heat Pump Association (EHPA).

Title: New Daikin controller wins design award
Summary: JAPAN: A new AC controller, set for European release, is one of three Daikin products to have received 2025 Good Design Awards from the Japan Institute of Design Promotion.

Title: U-3ARC to host first international conference
Summary: BURKINA FASO: U-3ARC, the African refrigeration and air conditioning association, is holding its first International Conference for the Popularisation of Refrigeration in Africa in Ouagadougou next month.
